event: Oprah Winfrey was born on January 29, 1954; her first name was spelled Orpah on Oprah Winfrey's birth certificate after the biblical figure in the Book of Ruth, but people mispronounced her first name regularly and "Oprah" stuck.
Name: Oprah Winfrey

event: By 1962, a teenaged mother, Vernita Lee was having difficulty raising both daughters, so Oprah Winfrey was temporarily sent to live with father Vernon Winfrey in Nashville, Tennessee.

event: Oprah Winfrey was called "arguably the world's's most powerful woman" by CNN and TIME, "arguably the most influential woman in the world's" by The American Spectator, "one of the 100 people who most influenced the 20th Century" and "one of the most influential people" from 2004 to 2011 by TIME.
